definition: water/river/liquid/beverage/additional charges or income/(of clothes) classifier for number of washes

sentences.english: A new instrument for measuring the total precipitable water in the atmosphere is introduced.
sentences.chinese: 介绍一种测量大气水汽总量的新方法和仪器。

sentences.english: As the vapor condenses into rain, the local atmospheric pressure drops.
sentences.chinese: 当水汽凝成雨水，会造成局域性的大气压力下降。

sentences.english: Moisture in the atmosphere condensed into dew during the night.
sentences.chinese: 大气中的水汽在夜里凝成了露水。

sentences.english: At night, water vapors in the air turn into small water-drops when it encounters cold temperatures.
sentences.chinese: 夜晚，当温度冷时，空气中的水汽转化为小小的水滴。

sentences.english: An airplane flew across the sky trailing white vapor .
sentences.chinese: 一架飞机从空中飞过，尾部拖着一条水汽形成的白线。

sentences.english: Water vapour in gas condensate reservoir has effect on the phase state of the gas condensate system.
sentences.chinese: 凝析气藏中的水汽对凝析气体系相态变化有重大影响。

sentences.english: The movement direction of the moisture channel center is identical with the low-level southeast jet.
sentences.chinese: 水汽输送通道中心的移向与低空东南急流的移向一致。

sentences.english: A curious deposit all over my snuff-box, evidently residue of moisture acting on lacquer.
sentences.chinese: 我的漆器鼻烟盒上也笼罩着一层水汽。

sentences.english: It is very important that vapor transport of low-leve1 from east.
sentences.chinese: 而低层东路水汽的输送对大暴雪的贡献极为重要。

sentences.english: Take note of the glass fogging up and the sound of the water hitting the shower door or curtain.
sentences.chinese: 留意玻璃蒙上水汽和水击打在淋浴门或门帘上的声音。

sentences.english: Your glasses would completely steam up when you come into the warm room in winter.
sentences.chinese: 在冬天进到温暖的房间时，眼镜上会全部蒙上水汽。

sentences.english: Where one could look out through the wet window at the starry night .
sentences.chinese: 从那里透过水汽蒙蒙的玻璃可以望到外面的星夜。

sentences.english: Research on the phase state of the gas-condensate system with water vapour;
sentences.chinese: 凝析气藏中的水汽对凝析气体系相态变化有影响。

sentences.english: When the shear line vapour band is weak, and the Plateau shear line will move southeastward.
sentences.chinese: 切变线水汽带减弱时，高原切变线东南移。

sentences.english: Cup of water vapor emitted slightly, tea quietly afloat.
sentences.chinese: 杯子冒出微微的水汽，茶叶静静浮着。

sentences.english: Water vapor content of the quarter decreased with increase in height.
sentences.chinese: 各季水汽含量随高度增加而减弱。

definition: (of a vapor etc) to rise/to hang in the air
Yushui or Rain Water, 2nd of the 24 solar terms 二十四節氣|二十四节气 19th February-5th March
